description: Justin Matthews has just moved into his new place, and he proudly shows it off to buddy Jake Porter, bragging about all the new furniture and amenities. Jake is really impressed with Justin's taste, and when he hears that the bed is new as well, he takes that as a sign. A fresh set of sheets sounds like the perfect opportunity for Jake for the two of them to break them in, and Justin is more than willing to christen the bedroom. One thing is for sure: Justin's sheets are gonna need a thorough washing after the two of them get done!Enjoy!
title: Breaking in the New Pad
